    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfPlayers

        public int getNumberOfPlayers()
        Gets the number of players from the user.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of players as an int.

      • getBet

        public int getBet​(int playerIndex,
                  PlayerList players,
                  Board b,
                  int currentBet,
                  Pot p,
                  RoundOfPlay round)
        Gets the type of bet from the player.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the index of the player making the bet in the PlayerList players as a Player object
        players - the list of players currently in the game as a PlayerList object
        b - the current board as a Board object
        currentBet - the value of the current bet as an int
        p - the current pot as a Pot object
        round - the current round as a RoundOfPlay object
        Returns:
        Returns 1 for raise, 2 for call, and 3 for flop.

      • getRaiseValue

        public int getRaiseValue()
        Gets the amount the player chooses to raise by from the user. Used if they choose the raise bet type.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer number to raise by.

      • getHand

        public void getHand​(Player p,
                    Board b)
        Gets the cards the user chooses to play at the end of the game and sets the hand attribute of the Player object it is passed.
        Parameters:
        p - the player to get the hand for as a Player object
        b - the current board as a Board object

      • getRevertOption

        public boolean getRevertOption()
        Gets whether or not the player wants to revert to an earlier point in the game.
        Returns:
        Returns true if they choose to revert and false if they choose not to.

      • getRevertChoice

        public int getRevertChoice​(CareTaker careTaker)
        Gets location that the user chooses to return to.
        Parameters:
        careTaker - list of states that can be reverted to.
        Returns:
        the index+1 of the element of the careTaker to revert to.

      • getSaveOption

        public boolean getSaveOption()
        Gets whether or not the player chooses to save the game.
        Returns:
        Returns true if they chose to save and false if they chose not to save.

      • displayWinner

        public void displayWinner​(Player winner)
        Displays the number of the winning player.
        Parameters:
        winner - the winning player as a Player object
